text:
It’s cool you’ve managed to get various work experience from different companies. You’re got an impressive reel. Can I ask what kind of work you do on the ILM team? How much is composting and how much is roto prep and the more tedious parts.

I finished a short course recently, with Ian Murphy who does a lot of senior comp training in all the studios. Finishing up some green screen keying and I’m ready to start applying :grimacing:
